pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a beautiful nighttime scenery shot of a city, capturing a wide view of a river with a grand, illuminated building on the far bank. The golden lights from the building and streetlights create shimmering reflections on the water's surface, set against a deep blue night sky with soft clouds. The camera slowly pans along the river, while a boat glides on the water, adding a sense of gentle movement to the tranquil scene.
